One Piece

Description : -
The story revolves around Monkey D. Luffy, a young pirate with the goal of becoming the Pirate King by finding the legendary treasure known as One Piece. Luffy gains the ability to stretch his body like rubber after eating a Devil Fruit. Accompanied by a diverse and lively crew, the Straw Hat Pirates, Luffy explores the Grand Line, faces formidable foes, and discovers the mysteries of the world.
